Name: Bibimbap Stone Pot
Description: choice of rice or noodles, w/ broccoli, cauliflower, bell peppers, carrots, garlic, green onion and egg, served w/ house BBQ sauce.

Name: Chicken Katsu Tokyo Curry Rice
Description: deep fried panko breaded chicken served w/ curry sauce, served w/ steamed rice and a side salad.

Name: Bulgogi Bowl
Description: Thin-sliced marinated beef steak, broccoli, carrots, green onion, and sesame seeds.
